ANU.name: Frank Millward
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
ANU.biography: He lectures in digital media, music technology, composition and sonic arts. While continuing to receive commissions for new work, he also creates soundtracks for documentary films for ABC-TV, BBC-TV, Channel 4 and independent producers in Australia and the U.K. He has held academic positions as Lecturer in Keyboards at Southern Cross University, Convenor of Jazz Studies at Conservatorium of Music, Griffith University, Principal Lecturer and then Professor of Music at Kingston University, London and Head of the School of Creative Arts Newcastle University, Australia

Microsoft-Academic.title: visiosonics developing moving images in direct response to sound improvising with technology
Microsoft-Academic.source: international journal of performance arts and digital media
